成人劑量:
Overdosage of folic acid antagonists: IVD, up to 75 mg within 12 hr, followed by 12 mg IM q6h for 4 doses.
Leucovorin rescue: Begin within 24 hr of methotrexate administration. Doses of up to 120 mg > 12-24 hr by IM or IVD, followed by IM 12-15 mg or PO 15 mg q6h for next 48 hr with low doses of methotrexate, PO 15 mg q6h.
Megaloblastic anaemia: IM, PO, not more than 1 mg/day.
作用: 改善葉酸拮抗劑所引起毒性
注意事項: Leucovorin 別名: Folinic Acid, Folinate
